item.title: About
item.description: Songlin (Tantalus) is an undergraduate student in his senior year at Shanghai Jiao Tong University (SJTU). He has a general interest in developing understanding into computer systems, and assisting the authoring of better software. Songlin is currently a research assistant at Lab of Cryptography and Computer Security, and he works primarily on software security. His paper “Accelerating SM2 Digital Signature Algorithm Using Modern Processor Features” has been accepted to ICICS'19. Currently he is working on LLVM and Intel MPK for program hardening.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hi, this is Tantalus. I'm going to write about my life and my explorations. Cheers!
